CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function addRemote is vulnerable to command injection because it concatenates user-supplied input into a command that is executed without proper sanitization or validation. An attacker could provide a specially crafted 'name' or 'url' that includes shell commands, which would be executed with the privileges of the process running the script.
